warning.skill.lack_hp: You don't have enough HP to use this skill.
warning.skill.lack_mp: You don't have enough MP to use this skill.
warning.skill.wrong_weapon: The skill cannot be used with the equipped item.
warning.skill.no_weapon: Since you are not using a weapon, you are unable to attack.
warning.skill.lack_arrow: You have used up all of your arrows.
warning.skill.lack_throwing_star: You have used up all of your throwing-stars.
warning.skill.in_cd: You may not use the skill yet. (Time left: %s sec)
warning.equip.invalid_stat: Your stats are too low to equip this item.
skill.description.0001000:
[Master Level : 3]
Hurls snail shells to attack monsters from long distance.
skill.description.0001001:
[Master Level : 3]
Enables the user to recover HP constantly for 30 sec. 
§6Terms between skills : 2 min.§r
skill.description.0001002:
[Master Level : 3]
Enables the character to move around quickly for a short amount of time. 
§6Terms between skills : 1 min.§r
skill.description.1000000:
[Master Level : 16]
Recover additional HP every 10 sec. while standing still.
skill.description.1000001:
[Master Level : 10]
This skill boosts up the amount of increase on Max HP after each Level UP, or AP used on Max HP.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Improving HP Recovery.§r
skill.description.1000002:
[Master Level : 8]
Recover HP with a shorter period of time.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Improving Max HP Increase.§r
skill.description.1001003:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily increases your weapon defense.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Endure§r
skill.description.1001004:
[Master Level : 20]
Use MP to deliver a killer blow to the monsters with a sword.
skill.description.1001005:
[Master Level : 20]
Use HP and MP to attack every enemy around you with a sword.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 1 on Power Strike§r
skill.description.2000000:
[Master Level : 16]
Recovering even more MP every 10 sec. The higher the level of the character and the skill level, the more recovery it enables the character to have.
skill.description.2000001:
[Master Level : 10]
This skill boosts up the amount of increase on Max MP after each Level UP, or AP used on Max MP.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Improving MP Recovery§r
skill.description.2001002:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily replaces damage with MP instead of HP. If MP reaches 0, the HP takes a full hit.
skill.description.2001003:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily boosts the weapon def. of the armor by blowing magic into it.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Magic Guard§r
skill.description.2001004:
[Master Level : 20]
Use MP to attack one enemy.
skill.description.2001005:
[Master Level : 20]
Use MP to attack an enemy twice.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 1 on Energy Bolt§r
skill.description.3000001:
[Master Level : 20]
Launches a critical attack with a given success rate.
skill.description.3000002:
[Master Level : 8]
Increases the range of attack for bows and crossbows.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on The Blessing of Amazon§r
skill.description.3001003:
[Master Level : 20]
Focusing to temporarily increase accuracy and avoidability.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on The Blessing of Amazon§r
skill.description.3001004:
[Master Level : 20]
Fires an arrow with authority. Applies more damage than usual.
skill.description.3001005:
[Master Level : 20]
Fires two arrows at once to attack an enemy twice.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 1 on Arrow Blow§r
skill.description.4000001:
[Master Level : 8]
Increases the range of attack using throwing weapons such as throwing stars & knives.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Nimble Body§r
skill.description.4001002:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily decreases the weapon def. and attacking abilities of the affected, even stunting the ongoing attacks. Can't use this skill on a monster that's already in "disorder."
skill.description.4001003:
[Master Level : 20]
Use MP to hide behind the shadows. Can't be attacked, and can't attack either.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Disorder§r
skill.description.4001334:
[Master Level : 20]
Use MP to quickly stab a monster twice in one turn using a dagger.
skill.description.4001344:
[Master Level : 20]
Use MP to throw 2 throwing stars and apply damage based on LUK, regardless of the rate of Claw Mastery.
skill.description.1100000:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the sword mastery and accuracy. It only applies when either a one-handed or a two-handed sword is in hand.
skill.description.1100001:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the axe mastery and accuracy. It only applies when either a one-handed or a two-handed axe is in hand.
skill.description.1100002:
[Master Level : 30]
Strikes an another, far deadlier blow following the initial attack with a given success rate. It works only when holding a one-hand or two-hand sword.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Sword Mastery§r
skill.description.1100003:
[Master Level : 30]
Strikes an another, far deadlier blow following the initial attack with a given success rate. It works only when holding a one-hand or two-hand axe.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Axe Mastery§r
skill.description.1101004:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the equipped sword. It only applies when either a one-handed or a two-handed sword is in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Sword Mastery§r
skill.description.1101005:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses HP and MP  to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the equipped axe. It only applies when either a one-handed or a two-handed axe is in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Axe Mastery§r
skill.description.1101006:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily boosts the weapon attack level of everyone in the party around the area, but also decreases the level of weapon attack defense.
skill.description.1101007:
[Master Level : 30]
Returns a portion of the damage received from the enemy. Can't return more than 10% of the enemy's Max HP at once, however.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Rage§r
skill.description.1200001:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the mastery of blunt weapons and accuracy. It only applies when either a one-handed or a two-handed blunt weapon is in hand.
skill.description.1200003:
[Master Level : 30]
Strikes an another, far deadlier blow following the initial attack with a given success rate. It works only when holding a one-hand or two-hand blunt weapon.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on BW Mastery§r
skill.description.1201005:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses HP and MP  to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the equipped blunt weapon. It only applies when either a one-handed or a two-handed blunt weapon is in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on BW Mastery§r
skill.description.1201006:
[Master Level : 20]
Threatens an enemy for a set duration. Reduce the Weapon Attack and Weapon Defense of multiple enemies within a certain range.
skill.description.1300000:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the spear mastery and accuracy. It only applies when a spear is in hand.
skill.description.1300001:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the mastery of pole arms and accuracy. It only applies when a pole arm is in hand.
skill.description.1300002:
[Master Level : 30]
Strikes an another, far deadlier blow following the initial attack with a given success rate. It works only when holding a one-hand or two-hand spear.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Spear Mastery§r
skill.description.1300003:
[Master Level : 30]
Strikes an another, far deadlier blow following the initial attack with a given success rate. It works only when holding a one-hand or two-hand pole arm.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Pole Arm Mastery§r
skill.description.1301004:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the equipped spear. It only applies when a spear is in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Spear Mastery§r
skill.description.1301005:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the equipped pole arm. It only applies when a pole arm is in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Pole Arm Mastery§r
skill.description.1301006:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily increases the level of weapon and magic defense on every member of the party around the area.
skill.description.1301007:
[Master Level : 30]
Temporarily increases the Max HP and Max MP of all members of the party around the area.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Iron Will§r
skill.description.2100000:
[Master Level : 20]
Absorbs the enemy's MP when attacking with Magic skills, until it reaches 0.
skill.description.2101001:
[Master Level : 20]
Meditate for a bit to temporarily boost up the magic attack of party members around the area.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on MP Eater§r
skill.description.2101002:
[Master Level : 20]
Use Move, Jump, or Sneak keys to teleport to other places in the same map on a set distance.
skill.description.2101003:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily slows down the movement of up to 6 monsters. Cannot be used on the same monsters more than twice in a row.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Teleport§r
skill.description.2101004:
[Master Level : 30]
Attacks a single monster with a fire arrow using the magic power. Applies 1.5 times the damage to the ice-based enemies, whereas fire-based enemies receive half the damage, if that.
skill.description.2101005:
[Master Level : 30]
Attacks a single monster by splashing a Poison drop.  With a given success rate, the monster gets temporarily poisoned.
skill.description.2201004:
[Master Level : 30]
Attacks a single monster with a sharp piece of Ice. The monster will freeze if hit.  Damages the fire-based enemies 1.5 times more, where as the ice-based enemies get only half the damage.
skill.description.2201005:
[Master Level : 30]
Attacks surrounding monsters with a thunder bolt.  All monsters in the range receive damage.
skill.description.2301002:
[Master Level : 30]
Recovers the HP of all party members around the area. The amount of healing depends on the number of people being healed, and the undead monster in the vicinity of this will receive damage.
skill.description.2301003:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily decreases the weapon damage received. It has no effect, however, on the magic attack.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Heal§r
skill.description.2301004:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily increases the weapon def., magic def., accuracy, and avoidability of all party members around the area. This cannot be combined with a skill or a potion.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Invincible§r
skill.description.2301005:
[Master Level : 30]
Attacks a single monster by firing Holy Arrows.  Very effective against the undead's or devil-based monsters.
skill.description.3100000:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the bow mastery and accuracy. It only applies when a bow is in hand.
skill.description.3100001:
[Master Level : 30]
Strikes an another, far deadlier blow following the initial attack with a given success rate. It works only when holding a bow.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Bow Mastery§r
skill.description.3101002:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the bow. It only works with a bow in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Bow Mastery§r
skill.description.3101003:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the success rate for pushing off the monsters when swinging a bow.  As the level rises, the number of monsters that one can push off with one swing increases.
skill.description.3101004:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily allows the character to fire bow arrows without using up the arrows. Only works with a bow in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Bow Booster§r
skill.description.3101005:
[Master Level : 30]
Fires arrows with bombs attached to it. If struck cleanly, the bomb explodes on the enemy, knocking out some of the enemies around with a certain success rate. Can't attack more than 6 at once, and it only works with a bow in hand.
skill.description.3200000:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the crossbow mastery and accuracy. It only applies when a crossbow is in hand.
skill.description.3200001:
[Master Level : 30]
Strikes an another, far deadlier blow following the initial attack with a given success rate. It works only when holding a crossbow.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Crossbow Mastery§r
skill.description.3201002:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the crossbow. It only works with a crossbow in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Crossbow Mastery§r
skill.description.3201003:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the success rate for pushing off the monsters when swinging a crossbow.  As the level rises, the number of monsters that one can push off with one swing increases.
skill.description.3201004:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily allows the character to fire crossbow arrows without using up the arrows. Only works with a crossbow in hand.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Crossbow Booster§r
skill.description.3201005:
[Master Level : 30]
Attacks up to 6 monsters at once with a powerful arrow, which penetrates through them. Damage decreases as the arrow flies through.
skill.description.4100000:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the mastery of throwing stars and accuracy, along with the maximum number of throwing stars to recharge. It only applies when the character is throwing stars.
skill.description.4100001:
[Master Level : 30]
Enables the character to make a critical attack with throwing stars on a certain success rate.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Claw Mastery§r
skill.description.4100002:
[Master Level : 20]
Recovers additional amount of HP and MP.
skill.description.4101003:
[Master Level : 20]
Use HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the claw. It only applies when the character is equipped with a claw throwing stars.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Claw Mastery§r
skill.description.4101004:
[Master Level : 20]
Temporarily boosts the speed and jumping ability of everyone in the party.
skill.description.4101005:
[Master Level : 30]
Absorb some of the damage dished out to the enemy as HP. The most one can absorb at once is the character's Max HP / 2, and can't absorb more than the Max HP of the enemy.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 3 on Endure§r
skill.description.4200000:
[Master Level : 20]
Increases the dagger mastery and accuracy. It only applies when the character has a dagger in hand.
skill.description.4201002:
[Master Level : 20]
Use HP and MP to temporarily boost up the attacking speed of the dagger. Only applies when the character has a dagger in hand. 
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Dagger Mastery§r
skill.description.4201004:
[Master Level : 30]
Steals one of the monster's items with a given success rate.  It works only once against the same monster.  The effort can be continued till its success.
Required Skill : §6At least Level 5 on Haste§r
skill.description.4201005:
[Master Level : 30]
Use MP to attack an enemy up to 6 times in a row with a dagger.
skill.description.5001001:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses MP to speed up the punch to rapidly attack enemies.
skill.description.5001002:
[Master Level : 20]
A devastating kick that accompanies a backward sommersault. Attacks all enemies in the vicinity.
skill.description.5001003:
[Master Level : 20]
Fires two bullets at once to apply double damage to monsters.
skill.description.5001005:
[Master Level : 10]
Press left or right arrow twice to temporarily boost your speed and jump.
skill.description.5100000:
[Master Level : 10]
Apply AP to Max HP to improve the rate of increase for Max HP.
skill.description.5100001:
[Master Level : 20]
Boosts the accuracy and the mastery of Knucklers. This skill only applies when you equip a Knuckler.
skill.description.5101002:
[Master Level : 20]
This skill allows you to quickly slide back and elbow multiple monsters at once to apply damage and temporarily stun them.
skill.description.5101003:
[Master Level : 20]
A quick round of two punches to apply damage and temporarily stun a monster.
skill.description.5101004:
[Master Level : 20]
This skill allows you to run forward and punch multiple monsters in front at once.
skill.description.5101005:
[Master Level : 10]
Recovers MP by using up a bit of HP.
skill.description.5101006:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses parts of HP and MP to temporarily boost the speed of a Knuckler. This skill can only be triggered when a Knuckler is equipped. 
Required Skill : §6Level 5 or above on Knuckler Mastery
skill.description.5101007:
[Master Level : 10]
This skill will allow you to safely navigate your way through monsters without being recognized by them...by donning an Oak Barrel. Some clever monsters may be able to tell, though, so be careful. If you are lying down, it's literally impossible to tell the difference!
skill.description.5200000:
[Master Level : 20]
Boosts the accuracy and the mastery of your Guns. This skill only applies when you equip a Gun.
skill.description.5201001:
[Master Level : 20]
Attacks multiple monsters by quickly firing a few bullets, so fast that the naked eye can't see the shooting.
skill.description.5201002:
[Master Level : 20]
Attacks a monster by throwing a grenade. The distance the grenade travels depends on how long you press the skill key.
skill.description.5201003:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses parts of HP and MP to temporarily boost the firing speed of the Gun.This skill can only be triggered when the Gun is equipped. 
Required Skill : §6Level 5 or above on Gun Mastery
skill.description.5201004:
[Master Level : 20]
This skill allows you to pretend shooting a gun, faking out the monsters, and instead of firing bullets, it'll fire a flag. This will temporarily stun up to 3 monsters.
skill.description.5201005:
[Master Level : 10]
Allows for a longer, more sustained jump than a regular jump.
skill.description.5201006:
[Master Level : 20]
Uses the recoil of the gun to run back after a gunshot. 
Required Skill : §6Level 5 or above on Wings§r

skill.description.level.1301005: HP -%1$s, MP -%1$s; increase in pole arm speed for %2$s sec.

skill.description.level.2101001: MP -%1$s; party's magic attack +%2$s for %3$s sec.
skill.description.level.2101002: MP -%1$s; teleport with a specific distance.
skill.description.level.2101005:
MP -%1$s; Basic attack %2$s, mastery %3$s%%, %4$s%% success rate,
poison for %5$s sec.
skill.description.level.2301004:
MP -%1$s; +%2$s on accuracy, avoidability,
weapon and magic def. for %3$s sec.
skill.description.level.3100001: %1$s%% Success rate, final attack with bow damage %2$s%%
skill.description.level.3101002: HP -%1$s, MP -%1$s; increase in bow attacking speed for %2$s sec.
skill.description.level.3101004: MP -%1$s; attack for %2$s sec without using up an arrow.
skill.description.level.3200001:
%1$s%% Success rate,
final attack with crossbow damage %2$s%%
skill.description.level.3201002: HP -%1$s, MP -%1$s; improves crossbow speed for %2$s sec.
skill.description.level.4100000:
Mastery of claw-related weapons %1$s%%, accuracy +%2$s%%,
%3$s extra throwing stars.
skill.description.level.4101003: HP -%1$s, MP -%1$s; Increase in claw's attacking speed for %2$s sec.
skill.description.level.4101004: For MP -%1$s, +%2$s in speed and +%3$s in jump for %4$s sec.
skill.description.level.4101005: MP -%1$s; absorb %2$s%% of damage as HP, damage %3$s%%
skill.description.level.4201002: HP -%1$s, MP -%1$s; improves dagger speed for %2$s sec.
skill.description.level.4201004: MP -%1$s, %2$s%% success rate to steal, apply %3$s%% in damage.
text.tip.hp_alert: Enter §7"/trigger hp_warning set <0~100>"§r to set the percentage for HP alert. §6(Click to copy)§r
text.tip.mp_alert: Enter §7"/trigger mp_warning set <0~100>"§r to set the percentage for HP alert. §6(Click to copy)§r
